name: Julian
text: Food was decent, personally the cost didn't match the quality in flavor. Staff is actually really nice and professional. Wait times are normal, might have to try something else off the menu. So far the Pizza and Spaghetti is what I've tried... Not bad but the cost was a bit much, more like a 3.5

name: Parixit Modi
text: Very nice restaurant! Great food! Great customer service! Staff is very friendly and courteous! Pay great attention to your order and check on you frequently when you are waiting for your food!

name: Amanda Ofstedahl
text: Took my daughter here for a girls lunch and we were both very pleased. Our waitress was amazing. She was very personable from the start, complimenting my daughter in her curly hair. She was attentive and made sure our glasses were never ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff Braun
text: We wish we live closer to this Boston's!! Never any complaints. The best food, service, prices  and rewards program in Tucson! Great atmosphere that is hard to explain because we ALWAYS leave here in a good mood. Good people that must be trained very well. Keep up the good work and will see you again soon.

name: Vernon Payne
text: Great place lived the service and the Santafe chicken was Awesome.  Thank you all and like always at Boston's... I always have a wonderful time  . Thank you all

name: Kelly Jo Volin
text:
Great service. Everyone was socially distanced, with plexiglas separating booths. Menu's were one time use paper and all staff wore masks.
The food was absolutely delicious!

name: Eli Quinn
text: My mother and I came here for lunch after her not visiting in years and we were very pleased with the experience! Our server was great and our Team Platter was fantastic. Excellent visit!

name: H Laker
text: Great atmosphere with lots of space & quick service. They got us in right away when others couldn't. Thanks for a quick & tasty meal!

name: Beth Resille
text: Had a jalapeno/ straw burger. It was delicious. Boston's is so much more than pizza and spaghetti. I enjoy this place. Something for every taste.

name: Kristina Young
text: The portions here are nice, so I end up having leftovers for the next day! When comparing pricing to portions, this place is worth it! When I first tried it, I ordered the chicken Alfredo and Chance got the Mama Meata Pasta. The Mama's was so good, so I ordered it when we had this place again! üòä

name: Jody Wagner
text: The 4-7 happy hour is awesome and delicious. Britney working the bar was amazing and I highly recommend this place for a casual fun evening with good food. üëç

name: Heather Snapp
text: Love everything about this place!  The amazing and friendly employees are why I keep going back and their food is awesome too!  They also have a great loyalty program that gives you free food and money towards future purchases!!!

name: Susan Wanders
text: Got salad which was unimpressive. The chicken was breaded chicken nuggets, not chicken stripes like picture so again not impressed. The flarbread was basically a cheese pizza and burger was basic. Not worth the price in my opinion. 3 stars cause order was correct and on time

name: Stella Ybarra
text:
Food is fantastic!! Great variety.
Nice sport bar. Will definitely return

name: Lonzo Gonzo
text: Awesome food....best bartender (Brittany) ever. Great family atmosphere.  You will enjoy it.

text: Great atmosphere,  good meeting place personal,  or business. Very well priced.  Staff was friendly. Apparently i was too hungry to take a photo,  oops! My bad.  I had a burger,  my bf had the wings. It was all delicious.

name: Ben Anderson

name: Kimberly Pierson

text: Very good pizza, waitresses are amazing! Its a bit pricey but good. Ive never been anywhere that has the large tasty veggies on Supreme pizza. Wish id taken a picture to share.

name: Keith Pullen
text: Several years ago I ordered a half chicken dinner at a midtown Boston's.  It was very good and I was hoping to get it again. But it wasn't on the menu and nothing even close. I ordered a burger and it was good. But I was disappointed that they don't have the half chicken dinner at this location.
